triples.name: Robot navigation
triples.relevance: Mobile robot navigation is the fundamental task that Navigation2 addresses for operation in warehouses and alongside pedestrians.

triples.name: Robot Operating System
triples.relevance: ROS Navigation was the predecessor system that Navigation2 builds upon and improves over a 10-year period.

triples.name: Behavior tree (artificial intelligence, robotics and control)
triples.relevance: Navigation2 employs behavior trees for navigator task orchestration, a key novel component of the system.

triples.name: Message passing
triples.relevance: ROS2, which Navigation2 is built on, uses a secure message passing framework for inter-process communication.
